seo.description: Personal website of programmer Arkadiusz Bachorski
jumbotron.passion: I make the Internet on a daily basis
aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.text1: I've been interested in IT since I was a child. My parents say I typed my first words on keyboard instead of writing them on paper. At the end of the first class of Technical High School for Computer Science I took a serious interest in programming and I fell in love with it. Since then, I've been fulfilling my dream of being the best programmer I can.
aboutMe.text2: I am a fan of new technologies, dark theme everywhere I can, keyboard shortcuts and automating everything. I my spare time, when I'm not reading any documentation or dev.to article, I like to ride a motorcycle, run or read books. I also enjoy going out for a ramen noodles, butter chicken or some Baltic Porter with my friends. I almost never part with my headphones.
technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.text: If I had to define myself, I would say I am a Fullstack Web Developer. My main focus is on code quality and user experience. On the front-end I prefer to use React with styled-components, Redux and Jest tests. On the server side, so far I bet on Laravel and MySQL, but I plan to learn Express. I am not afraid of simple design, but I don't go beyond my own needs.
projects.title: Projects
contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you have some interesting idea, would like to cooperate, ask me a question or just talk - don't hesitate to ask me!
projects.zhonya.description: Zhonya is an application that allows users to easily measure time which they spend on specific activity to improve their time management possibilities.
projects.xmake.description: Additional Laravel Artisan xmake command for faster resource creating and scaffolding. Created to speed up developing process.
